title: All That She Desires: The Billionaire's Point of View
description: Part 2 of ALL THAT SHE WANTS, a retelling of ALL THAT *HE* WANTS from the hero's point of view!  After an incredibly hot tryst in the company boardroom, Connor succeeded in convincing Lily to come back with him to his palatial penthouse.  But now she seems to be having second thoughts.  Connor is going to have to pull out all of his tricks if he wants to get Lily back into bed... and if he wants to tear down the walls around her heart.  This ebook also contains a preview of Olivia Thorne's newest serial, MIDNIGHT DESIRE (A Midnight Riders Motorcycle Club Romance Part 1).  18,000 words plus sneak preview of MIDNIGHT DESIRE. Contains profanity and explicit sensual scenes.  ALL THAT HE WANTS (Volume 1) now available - contains parts 1, 2, 3, and 4 of the series!
author: Olivia Thorne
